Details: The Cordyceps extract could increase the number of T-helper cells and the ratio of T-helper and T-suppressor cells in mice. (Chen et al. 1987). Increasing evidence shows that is a bidirectional modulator with both potentiating and suppressive effects on the immune system through regulating innate and adaptive immunity. (Feng. Yang and Li 2008 Zhou et al. 2009). Cordycepin and beta-glucan compound from Cordyceps extract can improve the anti-tumor immune response by recruiting tumor-killing granulocytes.
